oai_dc:dc.dc:title: NEARSHORE WAVE DYNAMICS SIMULATED BY BOUSSINESQ TYPE MODELS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sorensen, Ole R.
Madsen, Per A.
Schaffer, Hemming A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: wave dynamics
Boussinesq model
wave simulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper presents a numerical study of nearshore wave dynamics including the surf zone. Two different time-domain Boussinesq type formulations are applied for this purpose. The first model incoporates Pade [2,2] dispersion characteristics and lowest order nonlinearity. The second and more sophisticated model incorporates Pade [4,4] characteristics and higher-order nonlinearity in the dispersive terms. The models are validated on the shoaling and breaking of regular and irregular waves with and without an ambient current.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 26 (1998): Proceedings of 26th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Copenhagen, Denmark, 1998.
